text:
="preserve">Thomas Raymond Prosser (2 March 1927 – 22 November 2020) was a Welsh international rugby union prop. He played club rugby for Pontypool and was capped 22 times for Wales.
Prosser also represented the British Lions in their 1959 tour of Australia and New Zealand. He also played invitational rugby for the Barbarians. He was born in Pontypool, Wales.

annotations.surface_form: 1959 tour of Australia and New Zealand
